name: MagicDraw SysML - Modelica Integration
tagline: Java-based implementation of the OMG SysML-Modelica Transformation (SyM) using MagicDraw SysML
body:
### Welcome to the MagicDrawSysML-Modelica Integration GitHub Page.
This project is an implementation of the OMG SysML-Modelica Transformation [OMG SysML-Modelica Transformation](http://www.omg.org/spec/SyM/). This Java-based implementation supports SysML models from [MagicDraw SysML](http://www.nomagic.com/products/magicdraw-addons/sysml-plugin.html). MagicDraw users can use the MagicDraw plugins provided by this project to import/export Modelica models to SysML.

### Installation instructions
Instructions to install and execute the roundtrip SysML-Modelica transformation can be found on the Wiki of the GitHub edu.gatech.mbse.mdsysmlmodelica project [here](https://github.com/SysMLModelicaIntegration/edu.gatech.mbse.mdsysmlmodelica/wiki/Instructions-to-install-and-execute-the-roundtrip-SysML-Modelica-transformation).

### Authors and Contributors
The main contributors to this project are Axel Reichwein (@axelreichwein) and Chris Paredis. 

### Support or Contact
Having any trouble? Contact Axel Reichwein at axel.reichwein@konekys.com.
